inlineContent.text: A license can specify various information and conditions,
such as customer, expiration date, tier, the bundles and
platforms it can be used with, which features it unlocks,
etc. You can also define additional info.
The various dates let you tailor your license conditions.

abstract.text: This struct represents a software license and also works
as a namespace for license-related types.
This struct represents a license tier, which defines
the level of service that a license provides.
